page.title: 03RYTON VILLAGE GREEN.
page.content: Ryton Village Green}is the pride of Ryton with the cross in the middle. The cross was assembled by Thomas Chancer in 1795 .The green as everyone calls it is one of the oldest things in Ryton and it is said to be the eart of Ryton. It was on the village green that the Ryton Hirings were held twice a year, in May and in November.Although they were mainly for the hiring of farm servants,this was a day which drew hundreds of people from neighbouring villages to take part in the sports and other attractions for the visitors.The custom stopped in 1890.
